class.name: HashingContext
class.brief_description: Provides functionality for computing cryptographic hashes chunk by chunk.

method.name: finish
method.description: Closes the current context, and return the computed hash.

method.name: start
method.description: Starts a new hash computation of the given [param type] (e.g. [constant HASH_SHA256] to start computation of an SHA-256).

method.name: update
method.description: Updates the computation with the given [param chunk] of data.
